name: Fat Cat
blurb: Fat Cat is a Mobile, 2D, Casual, Twitch game. Fat Cat is so fat he needs YOUR help to get around the world, but BE CAREFUL!

rewards.reward: No Reward
-----------*A BIG THANK YOU*-----------\r\nA BIG Thank You for your support! We love you forever!!!
-----------*NAME ON SITE*-----------\r\nYour name will be added onto our site under the backer section as a THANK YOU, Plus get the Game for FREE! AND...a BIG THANK YOU!

-------------------*LUCKY*------------------\r\nExclusive to Backers Custom Wallpaper that can be put on your devices, Being the First to know when the Game is going to be released before the rest of the world and you will also be getting a virtual Thank You card from us! Plus, All Previous Reward Tiers, AND...a BIG THANK YOU!
-----------*I LOVE MUSIC*-----------\r\nDigital Sound Track, Plus, All Previous Reward Tiers, AND...a BIG THANK YOU!

------------*CREDITS & ART*-------------\r\n------*EARLY BACKER SPECIAL!*------\r\nYour name put into the Credits of the game, Digital Art Book full of pictures, conceptual art and MORE! Plus, All Previous Reward Tiers, AND...a BIG THANK YOU!

------------*CREDITS & ART*-------------\r\nYour name put into the Credits of the game, Digital Art Book full of pictures, conceptual art and MORE! Plus, All Previous Reward Tiers, AND...a BIG THANK YOU!
------------*GOT A PEN*------------\r\nExclusive to Backers Pen, All Previous Reward Tiers, AND...a BIG THANK YOU!
----------*HANG A POSTER*----------\r\nExclusive to Backers Poster Signed by the Team, All Previous Reward Tiers, AND...a BIG THANK YOU!
--------------*NICE SHIRT*--------------\r\nFat Cat T-Shirt exclusive to kickstarter backers, All Previous Reward Tiers, AND...a BIG THANK YOU!

--------------*SWEET SHIRT*--------------\r\n------*EARLY BACKER SPECIAL!*------\r\nFat Cat T-Shirt with Backers Name, Plus, All Previous Reward Tiers with the EXCEPTION of the NICE SHIRT tier. Plus...a BIG THANK YOU!
--------------*SWEET SHIRT*--------------\r\nFat Cat T-Shirt with Backers Name, Plus, All Previous Reward Tiers with the EXCEPTION of the NICE SHIRT tier. Plus...a BIG THANK YOU!

-----*PROTECT YOUR PRECIOUS*-----\r\n------*EARLY BACKER SPECIAL!*------\r\niPhone 4/4s or 5 (Backers Choice) Case exclusive to kickstarter backers, Plus, All Previous Reward Tiers, AND...a BIG THANK YOU! (Backers choice of either the SWEET SHIRT or NICE SHIRT tier)

-----*PROTECT YOUR PRECIOUS*-----\r\niPhone 4/4s or 5 (Backers Choice) Case exclusive to kickstarter backers, Plus, All Previous Reward Tiers, AND...a BIG THANK YOU! (Backers choice of either the SWEET SHIRT or NICE SHIRT tier)

--------*BETA! BETA! BETA!*--------\r\nGain access to the beta of the game! Be the first to test and play the game and give us your feedback! (Beta release date to be announced. This may require additional app downloads *which are free*.) Plus, All Previous Reward Tiers, AND...a BIG THANK YOU! (Backers choice of either the SWEET SHIRT or NICE SHIRT tier)

-----------*IT'S CODE TIME*-----------\r\nSpecial in game code exclusive to backers ONLY! (This code could give you bonus levels, special outfits for your cat, bonus coins and more. Only backers will have access to this code) Plus, All Previous Reward Tiers, AND...a BIG THANK YOU! (Backers choice of either the SWEET SHIRT or NICE SHIRT tier)

---------*NAME THAT LEVEL*---------\r\nGet a chance to be part of the game and Name a Level! (Name must be appropriate please and will be approved by us) Plus, All Previous Reward Tiers, AND...a BIG THANK YOU! (Backers choice of either the SWEET SHIRT or NICE SHIRT tier)

----*NAME THAT WORLD & LEVEL*----\r\nGet a chance to be part of the game and Name a World and Level! This one is special because there will only be about 6 worlds so 3 of the 6 worlds will be named by backers! (Name must be appropriate please and will be approved by us) Plus, All Previous Reward Tiers with the EXCEPTION of the NAME THE LEVEL tier. Plus...a BIG THANK YOU! (Backers choice of either the SWEET SHIRT or NICE SHIRT tier)

----------*LEVEL CREATION*----------\r\nYou will get a chance to be part of the game and work with us to create and name a level to be put into the game for everyone to play! (Will work together over Skype or another way) Plus, All Previous Reward Tiers with the EXCEPTION of the NAME THAT WORLD & LEVEL and NAME THE LEVEL tier. Plus...a BIG THANK YOU! (Backers choice of either the SWEET SHIRT or NICE SHIRT tier)

-------*CAT OUTFIT CREATION* -------\r\nYou will get a chance to be part of the game and work with us to create and name an outfit for the cat to wear in the game! Everyone who downloads the game will have access to the outfit you create! (Outfit and name must be appropriate please and will be approved by us. Will work together over Skype or another way) Plus, All Previous Reward Tiers with the EXCEPTION of the LEVEL CREATION, NAME THAT WORLD & LEVEL and NAME THE LEVEL tier. Plus...a BIG THANK YOU! (Backers choice of either the SWEET SHIRT or NICE SHIRT tier)

--*CHARACTER/ENEMY CREATION*--\r\nYou will get a chance to be part of the game and work with us to create and name a Collectable Character or Enemy (Backers choice) to be put into the game! This could be an enemy, a collectible or something else. (Character or Enemy and name must be appropriate please and will be approved by us. Will work together over Skype or another way) Plus, All Previous Reward Tiers with the EXCEPTION of the CAT OUTFIT CREATION, LEVEL CREATION, NAME THAT WORLD & LEVEL and NAME THE LEVEL tier. Plus...a BIG THANK YOU! (Backers choice of either the SWEET SHIRT or NICE SHIRT tier)

---*MARKET YOUR COMPANY*--- Your Companies Name/Logo will be seen when the game is first launched and shown as a splash screen. Everyone playing this game will know your company graciously backed this project! (company name and logo must be appropriate please and will be approved by us.) Plus, All Previous Reward Tiers with the EXCEPTION of the CHARACTER/ENEMY CREATION, CAT OUTFIT CREATION, LEVEL CREATION, NAME THAT WORLD & LEVEL and NAME THE LEVEL tier. Plus...a BIG THANK YOU! (Backers choice of either the SWEET SHIRT or NICE SHIRT tier)
